title: Prince William Forest Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Firewood  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Firewood  Outside firewood is prohibited in Prince William Forest Park, unless it is certified USDA 'bug free' firewood.  Dead and downed wood may be collected from designated areas for use while in the park.  Help us protect the forest from invasive species!          NO FIREWORKS  Alert 2 , Severity ,caution ,, NO FIREWORKS  Reminder to park visitors. Fireworks are prohibited at Prince William Forest Park.          Warm Wet Spring = More Ticks  Alert 3 , Severity ,caution ,, Warm Wet Spring = More Ticks  Please check yourself and your pets for ticks continually during and after your visit.  Ticks are less prevelent if you stay on trail or in mowed areas. Wearing light colored clothing helps you spot them before the attach.
